Jeffrey León Pulido

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/1739880075458171
  • Última atualização do currículo em 18/04/2012

Graduated in Chemical Engineering from the Industrial University of Santander (Colombia), Internal Auditor SGS International, currently concludes Master's degree in Chemical Engineering at the University of Campinas and develops Ph.D. studies in Chemical Engineering from the same university. Have experience in Chemical Process, Intensification Processes, Heat Transfer and Tansfer Technology. Specializes in design of plants and process optimization aimed at reducing energy consumption in industrial processes using computational tools such as Aspen Plus, Aspen Hysys, Ansys, Matlab, Rhinoceros, Solid Words. (Texto informado pelo autor)
